title: Mesa Verde National Park: Collections
body: Collections       Museum Collection The Mesa Verde National Park and Yucca House National Monument collection has moved to its new facility in the Visitor and Research Center at the park entrance. The collection's new home includes spacious work areas for researchers and viewing portals so the public can see into the repository and the collections processing room. For information on the status of accessing the collection for research purposes, please contact Tara Travis, Museum Curator at (970) 529-4614.
